obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_11_0: * The gash weaves down as if you cry./%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_15_0: * It's a red wagon with a rusty birdcage in it./
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_16_0: * Looks like it's seen quite a few crashes./%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_21_0: * (It's Chairiel^1, the beloved living room chair.)/%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_48_0: * S-stop^1!&* I'm still recovering from where you hurt me./
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_49_0: * Plus^1, I just ate^1, so I'll get a cramp if I fight you so quickly./%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_53_0: * Does your castle have a pool^1?&* I wanna know if I should bring my cute swimsuit.../%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_57_0: * Felt like I was soaring through the air earlier.../
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_81_0: * Mama miba^1! I'm TOPCHEF^1!&* My latest cake worked me to exhaustion!/
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_82_0: * So I took a little nap..^1.&* But^1, Mama miba^1!&* A scary noise woke me up!/
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_83_0: * A beast was hunched on the table^1, eating the cake like an animal!/
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_84_0: * I spritzed it with water^1, and it hissed and ran off^1!&* But^1, my wonderful cake is.../
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_86_0: * Aww^1, Kris^1, that sounds like Susie^1! We must be going the right way!/
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_87_0: \E1* Let's try to keep her out of any more trouble!/%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_90_0: * M-M-Mama miba^1! M-M-Mama SHIBA^1!&* You know that beast!^1?&* Please don't come back.../%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_95_0: * Mama miba^1! Mom AMOEBA^1!&* Y-You're the beast that ate my cake!/
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_97_0: * Yeah^1? So^1? Want me to spit it back out?/
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_101_0: * Ya sure^1? 'd probably make it better./%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_104_0: * Why are you looking at me like that!?/
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_106_0: * I don't trust anyone that won't eat my spit./
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_137_0: * W-woah^1! Wait a minute^1! Even if you're my enemy^1, I've got to warn you!/
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_138_0: * A purple beast is roaming^1, clobbering anyone who dares block her way...!/
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_139_0: * (Sob...^1) We don't even like fighting..^1. th-the King left us no choice.../
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_143_0: * O-oh..^1. Kris^1, we need to stop Susie^1, quick...!/%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_147_0: * (Sob...^1) We don't even like fighting..^1. th-the King left us no choice.../%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_159_0: * Woah^1, nice cheer^1.&* Look^1, Kris^1, I've got fans./%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_177_0: * I thought you were running away./
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_186_0: * Are you puzzled by COMBAT^1?&* Wanna know how TP works?/%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_187_0: * If you still haven't assembled all the details.../
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_188_0: * My cohorts to the WEST will gladly help you put the pieces together./%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_193_0: * Your friends can't \cYACT\cW alone^1, but they can still help you win peacefully./
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_194_0: * The \cGDARK PRINCE\cW's \cYPACIFY\cW spell can remove \cBTIRED\cW enemies safely from battle./
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_195_0: * If nothing else^1, why not try using an \cYITEM\cW?/
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_196_0: * Even if it seems useless^1, the effects may surprise you./%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_200_0: * What^1?&* I'm building a ladder here./
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_201_0: * Today's lesson is..^1.&* \cRGet out of my way when I'm building a ladder!\cW /
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_202_0: * Do you need an \cRinteractive tutorial\cW on \cRleaving me alone\cW?/%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_206_0: * Do you need an \cRinteractive tutorial\cW on \cRleaving me alone\cW?/%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_214_0: * \cYDEFENDING\cW will not only temporarily \cRreduce the damage\cW you take.../
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_215_0: * It also lets you focus^1, \cYrestoring TP\cW. You need \cYTP\cW to \cRCAST SPELLS\cW!/
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_216_0: * So don't be afraid to \cYDEFEND\cW^1!&* \cYDEFEND\cW and \cYCAST SPELLS\cW!/
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_217_0: * By the way^1, all leftover \cYTP\cW will \cRturn into extra MONEY\cW after the battle!/%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_221_0: * Getting close to \cYBULLETS\cW is really exciting^1, isn't it?/
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_222_0: * You'll \cRrecover a little\cW \cYTP\cW for each \cYBULLET\cW you get close to./
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_223_0: * Plus^1, \cRgetting close to bullets\cW can sometimes end the \cRenemy's attack faster\cW./
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_224_0: * It's quite \cRdangerous\cW though^1.&* So no worries if you don't want to try./%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_233_0: * (It's a candy tree.^1)&* (All the ripe candy has been picked.)/%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_236_0: * (It's a candy tree.^1)&* (All the ripe candy has been picked.)/
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_238_0: * Let's not take any more^1, Kris^1.&* Unripe candy is sour./
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_240_0: * What^1? Sour^1, sweet^1, meaty^1, bitter..^1. if it's candy^1, it's good!/
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_248_0: * What kind of candy is meaty?/
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_250_0: * Y'know^1.&* Whatever it's called^1.&* Uhhh^1, jerky./
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_254_0: * Then why is it next to it in the store!?/%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_262_0: * We're sorry^1.&* We're normally puzzle guys, but.../
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_263_0: * We've been forced to do TUTORIALS just to make ends meet./
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_264_0: * When the KING got power^1, he fired everyone and replaced all puzzle makers with HIM.../
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_265_0: * ROUXLS KAARD..^1.&* Lord of the Puzzles..^1.&* Be careful...!/%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_269_0: * The KING didn't even give us severance pay.../
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_270_0: * His son just gave us all beanies..^1.&* Itchy beanies.../%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_278_0: * Woah there^1, horsie^1. Ponmen're scary^1, but all'n they're doin' is following the King./
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_279_0: * Us on the Board used to have our own boss..^1. those'n were peaceful times./
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_280_0: * But now^1, even the boss's been reduced to the King's peon.../%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_285_0: * Haha^1, and these^1? These are my nostrils^1, not my eyes./
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_286_0: * ... can still see out of them^1, though./%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_292_0: * Fear not ^1- we^1, unlike the simple Ponmen^1, possess FULL faculty over our actions./
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_293_0: * I^1, Mr. Society^1, am far too intelligent to ever bow down to such a tyrant!/
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_294_0: * Unless he asks me^1.&* He's very scary^1, you see./%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_297_0: * What^1, you think you possess the power to topple that brute???/
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_298_0: * Yes^1! Yes^1! I'm sure everyone will support you^1! Go for it!/
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_299_0: * Just as long as I don't have to participate!/%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_304_0: * Hmmm..^1. Mr. Elegance has run off on some hellish errand.../
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_305_0: * Huh^1? No^1, I didn't help out at all!!/
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_306_0: * Why are or aren't you asking!?/%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_316_0: * Hey^1, kid^1. We managed to fix up this old thingamajig for you./
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_317_0: * It's some kinda door..^1. It can take you anywhere you want in the world!/
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_318_0: * As long as that's one of two locations./
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_319_0: * Anyhoo^1, we'll keep working on it..^1. Anything to help you out^1, kid!/%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_322_0: * Hey kid^1, we managed to get this door to go to the castle./
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_328_0: * Dunno..^1. come to think of it^1, I've never seen it before./%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_334_0: * Woah there^1, horsie^1. Me and Mr. Society got this door workin' for ya./
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_335_0: * It can go anywhere you want..^1. 'long as it's one of the two destinations./
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_336_0: * Since it was just the two of us^1, it was tough work^1, and it might break./
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_337_0: * Anyhow (ha ha) hope'n it helps you deal with the King./%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_340_0: * Woah there^1, horsie^1. Mr. Society and the puzzle guy fixed that door./
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_341_0: * Since it was just the three of us^1, it should work without any issues./
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_342_0: * Anyhow (ha ha) hope'n it helps you deal with the King./%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_346_0: * This door'll go even further than before./
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_347_0: * Not sure'n what we did to make it work like that^1, but.../%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_352_0: * Now^1, don't tell anyone Mr. Society helped..^1. he doesn't want none of that./
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_353_0: * I'm watchin' ya now..^1. with my nostrils./%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_365_0: * Don't mind me^1.&* I'm on break./
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_366_0: * ... Say^1, help me^1. I need to get something for my friend \cYCLOVER\cW'S birthday./
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_367_0: * Her only interests are \cYSPORTS\cW, \cYCUTE BOYS\cW, and \cYTREES\cW./
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_368_0: * ... maybe I'll just get her a card./%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_372_0: * Maybe I could put some money in the card..^1. No^1, I need that!/%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_383_0: * I used to WORK at the castle until the KING fired all the STAFF./
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_384_0: * What was my job^1? Oh^1, I was the ROYAL COAT RACK!/%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_389_0: * I noticed that you^1, simply took it^1, without asking!/
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_390_0: * That's fine^1! It's my gift to help you defeat the KING!/
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_391_0: * You folks are really energetic^1! Ha ha^1! And potentially criminals!/%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_397_0: * You folks look like heroes^1!&* Take the SCARF from this chest and DEFEAT the KING!/
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_398_0: * Besides^1, it's old^1, ragged^1, and doesn't fit me anymore!/
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_399_0: * That's what CHESTs are for^1! It's kind of hand-me-down situation in there!/%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_406_0: * Hey^1, where's that scarf^1! Did it not fit you?/
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_407_0: * That's OK^1! Just put it in a chest^1! Someone else will take it!/%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_412_0: * I used to WORK at the castle until the KING fired all the STAFF./
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_413_0: * What was my job^1? Oh^1, I was the ROYAL COAT RACK!/%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_421_0: * (I'm just a little ball^1, I don't want to discuss anything.)/%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_428_0: * Today's a special day^2~&* OBVIOUSLY^2.&* To some degree.../
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_429_0: * Do you know what day it is~^2?&* You BETTER^1.&* Um^1, it's OK if you don't.../%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_436_0: * Bow-Bow^1!&* (Break the Box for a Bracelet.)/
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_448_0: * The King wants to o-liminate Lightners^1, but..^1. we didn't o-gree with that./
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_449_0: * We o-scaped^1, but the o-thers were o-rrested.../%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_454_0: * Don't worry about talking to my o-ssociate here^1.&* Whenever Bow-Bow talks.../
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_455_0: * She always goes on and on and on and on and on and on and on and on and on and on.../
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_456_0: * And on and on and on and on and on and on and on and on and on and on and on.../%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_486_0: * (This cardboard stand is actually just a fake cardboard stand of a cardboard stand.)/%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_493_0: * Before the King came along^1, I used to eat the leaves from this tree.../
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_495_0: * Such is the way of the worm.../%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_498_0: * Such is the way of the worm.../%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_511_0: * S-somehow^1, Prince Lancer's made REAL friends with a Lightner.../
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_512_0: * S-somebody should tell the King^1, immediately...!/
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_513_0: * ... But^1, it's definitely not going to be me./
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_514_0: * Whoever breaks the news is gonna get wrecked!/%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_519_0: * Ugh^1! I'm jealous of everyone with a leaf!/%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_527_0: * How's the thrash machine we designed going?/
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_531_0: * The machine...^1? We had a whole sequence about it...?/
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_533_0: * Oh^1, that^1. Yeah^1, we'll make it at the last minute./
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_535_0: * You two should REALLY start working on it earlier.../
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_538_0: \E2* I didn't come here for a second dad!/
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_547_0: * Being a bad guy sure is relaxing!/
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_549_0: * Kris^1, if you're jealous^1, you can be a bad guy^1, too.../
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_551_0: * Kris isn't jealous of your evildoing lifestyle...!/
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_552_0: \E6* (But um^1, if you are^1, I can find a nice leaf and fan you...)/%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_560_0: * So^1, er..^1. ready to be a good guy again^1, Susie?/
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_562_0: * Nah^1. Gotta say being a bad guy is pretty sweet./
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_563_0: \E2* Not only is it WAY more fun than being "good,"/
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_564_0: * But MY teammate's PROUD of what I do./
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_566_0: * Earlier^1, Susie ate a pinecone off the floor./
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_567_0: * It gave her a terrible stomach-ache./
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_568_0: \E3* It was VERY brave and cool./
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_580_0: * The shadow's flares are making us as pale as a horse!/%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_591_0: * You can follow behind us^1, you know./
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_597_0: * ... I noticed you aren't doing that./
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_606_0: * Thanks for inviting me^1! This trash can's really great!/
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_607_0: * I apologize for the inconvenience earlier!/%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_610_0: * I'm gonna invite my friends into this trash can^1, too!/%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_618_0: * (Oh^1, oh^1. I'm just the cage.^1)&* (No one talks to me!)/%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_626_0: * (Us animals used to be alone in these cages^1.)&* (Now everyone's here.)/
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_627_0: * (So many new people..^1. Wish we could go back to the good old days,)/
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_628_0: * (When it was just us in these filthy cages.)/%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_632_0: * (The sound of various animals tumbling around.)/%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_638_0: * Woe^1! Oh^1, Woe^1!&* We are the three Former Kings^1!&* We beg you^1, free us!/
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_639_0: * Once^1, all four of us ruled together^1, but when the Knight arrived, everything changed.../
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_640_0: * Oh^1, my diamonds^1! My jewels^1! You must tell me if they're all right^1! Ohh!!/%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_644_0: * What^1, you say? Your world is in danger?/
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_645_0: * Well^1, that's a shame^1, isn't it./%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_653_0: * Since I didn't want to fight you guys^1, I got locked up.../
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_654_0: * How can I!^1? You guys seem WAY nicer than the King...!/%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_659_0: * Haha^1, I'd rather be in jail than face you guys^1! You're terrifying!/%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_665_0: * I was arrested for making a puzzle without a license.../
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_666_0: * I..^1. I'll never make another word search^1! Promise!/%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_675_0: * We sold all of our beds to replace them with treasure./
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_676_0: * My back hurts^1, but life has never been better!!!/%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_685_0: * You two are real heroes^1, you know that?/
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_689_0: * You too^1, Talking Beast..^1.&* You too./%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_694_0: * Hey^1, it's you^1!&* You're that peaceful Lightner!/
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_695_0: * Woah^1, you even tamed the beast that was tormenting us...!/
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_699_0: * Ohhh!!^1! You even taught the beast to talk!?/
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_706_0: * I'm sorry^1, we don't have any room for that./
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_708_0: * That's OK^1, I already ate it./%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_718_0: * You weren't as nice as I thought.../
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_719_0: * I guess people shouldn't have heroes./%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_723_0: * I..^1. I'll never forgive you for that forgiveness.../%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_727_0: * I feel just OK about you chumps now.../
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_728_0: * ... Wait^1, what about her^1?&* Will she hurt us anymore?/
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_731_0: \E2* (Unless Kris tells me to I guess.)/%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_747_0: * (Sigh...) I think making block-pushing puzzles is a totally hunky hobby.../%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_754_0: * (Looks like Hathy sold all the gems and replaced them with beds.)/
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_764_0: * (Hathy looked at you kindly^1. Your sins against Hathy were forgiven.)/%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_770_0: * We're sorry about hurting you earlier.../
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_771_0: \E8* We promise we won't do it anymore!/
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_773_0: * (Hathy felt your sincerity^1. Hathy forgived your sins...)/
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_774_0: * (You felt a weight being lifted from you.)/%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_786_0: * (Hathy looked at you kindly^1. You felt about the same.)/%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_792_0: * (Hathy will never forget what you've done.)/
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_807_0: * (Sigh...) Sorry I'm sighing^1, I didn't get much sleep./%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_812_0: * Oh^1! Let us take your coat^1!&* And put it in the TOILET^1! HA^1!&* ... which^1, we don't even have./
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_813_0: * Please try the baseballs~^1!&* Yeah^1! Eat so many you CHOKE^1!&* ... do they eat sports?/
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_814_0: * Then we can all play Twister~^1!&* Just stay OUT OF OUR WAY^1!&* ... we lose even by ourselves./%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_817_0: * Were you invited^1?&* YOU WEREN'T!!^1!&* You DID hurt us.../
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_818_0: * Awkward..^1.&* You wanna REMATCH!^1?&* You'd better leave.../%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_823_0: * I'm the first party member^1.&* I'm in charge of the DPS^1.&* (Dancin' Party Soundtrack.)/%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_827_0: * (Hathy is the second party member^1. It's the healer.)/
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_828_0: * (She was in charge of catering the party.)/
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_829_0: * (Unfortunately the cake she commissioned was destroyed in a field somewhere.)/%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_832_0: * (That's a risk that one always runs when ordering a cake.)/%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_845_0: * (What's all the fuss about^1? Fewer people are in cages...)/%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_849_0: * (Us animals decided it's OK if the Kings stay in the cages as well.)/
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_850_0: * (... but they'll have to put on animal ears and noses...)/%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_855_0: * What ho!^1! What about us!^1? Aren't we going to be restored as Kings...!?/
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_856_0: * ... Ah^1? My treasure is unharmed^1? Carry on^1, then./%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_865_0: * I'll be honest^1, at first we weren't sure who make our new King.../
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_866_0: * ... I mean^1, Lancer HAS always been a bit of a pain./
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_867_0: * But after seeing how nice he treats YOU guys^1, I think he'll be fine!/%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_870_0: * I have high hopes for the new King./
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_871_0: * He's already mandated a 400-percent increase in salsa production./%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_876_0: * Mama miba!^1! What a celebration!^1! This calls for a cake!!/
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_877_0: * And this time^1, I'll make it out of metal so animals can't eat it!/%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_880_0: * Clover's mother^1!&* Please sample my cakes any time!/
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_882_0: * Do I HAVE TO be Clover's mom to do that?/
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_888_0: * Mama miba^1! What a celebration^1! Everyone is here!/
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_889_0: * This must be the birthday party I made that cake for!!/
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_890_0: * Clover's birth!^1! Such a sweet occasion!^1! I might cry!/
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_892_0: * Uh..^1. actually^1, this whole thing is^1, like^1, OUR fault./
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_894_0: * Oh^1! Mon amiga!^1! Then..^1. YOU'RE Clover's mother!?!??/
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_895_0: * Now I understand why you ate the cake!^1! To protect her!!/
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_898_0: \E3* (Wait^1, if I go along with this^1, can I get more cake...?)/%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_913_0: * What's going on^1? I slept through everything.../%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_923_0: * The future looks sweet~^1!&* Like a pile of BEE'S PUKE^1.&* ... which^1, is honey^1, I think./
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_924_0: * A kingdom with so much hope~^1!&* Hope you didn't SCREW IT UP^1.&* ... that means thank you./
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_925_0: * Come to our next b-day^1, too~!&* We'll have one SOON!!^1!&* ... if that's..^1. possible.../%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_930_0: * I knew you could do it!/
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_931_0: * Though I was your enemy^1, I was cheering for you...!/
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_932_0: * ... That's how much I disliked my job./%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_945_0: \E3* Thou hast toppledst the Tyrant^1! Freedst our Creedst!/
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_947_0: \E2* The Tale of Rouxls Kaard^1, and the Three Heroes!/%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_955_0: * What about the part where you tried to kill us?/
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_957_0: * Ah..^1. an interesting Historical Theorie^1, is it not?/
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_958_0: \E4* Nonetheless^1, the evidence precludeth such a thing.../
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_962_0: * I shall giveth thou a plate of Worms for thou silence./
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_972_0: * You did it^1! You ousted that rotten tyrant!/
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_973_0: * I'll happily accept a bounty of credit for my contributions.../
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_974_0: * ... Unless the King reappears^1, in which case -^2- I did nothing!/%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_978_0: * Darn^1, horsey^1. You've'n done us a big help./
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_979_0: * Now all'n of us pieces can live in peaces./%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_982_0: * Boy^1, my nostrils can't thank you enough./%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1004_0: * Way to go^1, kids^1! Now we can go back to making the puzzles we love.../
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1005_0: * Life's got no tutorial^1, so try your best!/%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1008_0: * And^1, thanks to your donation^1, I could buy a new hat and some shaving cream./%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1013_0: * Got nothing left to teach you now.../
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1014_0: * Life's got no tutorial^1, so try your best!/%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1022_0: * Thank you^1! I can go back to being a coat hanger now!/
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1023_0: * By the by^1, I asked Seam to come here^1, but.../
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1028_0: * (Even a little ball can say something like "thank you.")/%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1049_0: * I love reading books^1.&* Especially the books upstairs^1.&* You should really./
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1068_0: * Hey^1 short-stuff^1.&* Why would YOU possibly need to talk to the mayor?/
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1069_0: * Your allowance too low^1?&* Ate too much candies^1?&* Lost your frisbee in the wash?/
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1071_0: * That's what the cops are for./%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1074_0: * What^1? Don't talk to you like you're a "kid^1?" Fine.../
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1075_0: * If you need someone to change your diaper^1, go ask the Cop's./%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1081_0: * I'm sorry^1, I'm sorry^1.&* The mayor is busy right now./
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1082_0: * If you need to see her^1, please try causing some terrible crisis./%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1086_0: * I'm sorry^1, I'm sorry^1.&* Are you here to complain about your teacher?/
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1087_0: * If you don't like her^1, please blame your mother for getting her hired.../%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1097_0: * The mayor's charisma is about zero^1.&* No^1, it's negative./
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1098_0: * But she works hard and has a good track record^1, so she runs unopposed./
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1103_0: * Not only does she act icy^1, she always keeps her office's AC on full blast./
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1104_0: * That chill I feel..^1. is..^1.&* Is this what politics feels like?/%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1136_0: * Uh^1, we'll take the special^1, and do you have any edible glitter...?/
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1137_0: * The youngest one won't eat anything if it doesn't look like treasure.../%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1139_0: * In a pinch^1, sprinkles will work^1, too.../%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1145_0: * Don't be a stranger now^1, alright^1, hun?/%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1151_0: * Hey there^1!&* Haven't seen you in a while^1, hun./
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1153_0: * I remember^1, back on Sundays^1, after service.../
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1154_0: * You and your family would come in and order the special./
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1157_0: * But every Sunday^1, you and your brother'd still come in./
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1158_0: * He'd order you a hot chocolate.../
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1159_0: * And you two'd sit down at that table in the corner.../
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1160_0: * ... drawin' shapes in the window with your breath./
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1162_0: * You must really miss him^1, huh?/
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1172_0: * ... You know^1, I'd give you a hot chocolate on the house.../
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1173_0: * ... But it looks like you've got enough things already./
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1198_0: * So^1, for you two girls^1, that'll be the crepes^1, a cinnamon latte.../
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1199_0: * Two bunny parfaits, and... a piece of firewood...?/%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1202_0: * And^1, how would you like that firewood done?/%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1212_0: * Dude^1, remember when we used to skip the first hour of class to come here?/
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1213_0: * YOU were fine^1, but I almost had to repeat the year 'cause of it.../
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1214_0: * Those crepes were MAD worth^1, though^1! Delinquency is the best condiment!/%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1217_0: * Dude^1, if we didn't bring Gerson our leftovers^1, I bet I would have failed HARD.../%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1226_0: * Looking at my rugged body^1, you must wonder what kind of secrets I hold.../
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1227_0: * My secret is^1, I put all my leftover pancakes in this giant hat./%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1237_0: * Ice Wolf does not like ice in drink./
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1243_0: * Ice Wolf also like ice-themed mascots./%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1255_0: * H-How am I supposed to get past this blue lady...!^1?&* I'm stuck!!/
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1256_0: * I-I guess I should just run away.../%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1260_0: * Police Chief Undyne is supposed to be directing traffic.../
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1261_0: * But all she's doing is standing in the middle of the street yelling "GET OUT OF MY WAY!!!"/
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1262_0: * She's the best^1, huh!^1?&* I feel really directed!!!/%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1276_0: * Yo^1, Kris^1!&* You survived Susie^1, haha!/
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1277_0: * I mean^1, I never saw her beat anyone up^1, but^1, uh^1, I'd be careful./
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1278_0: * Like^1, one time me^1, Snowy^1, and Jockington were playing handball,/
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1279_0: * And she just kept creepily watching us from the corner./
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1280_0: * Then^1, when the ball rolled over to her she just^1, uh^1, froze solid.../
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1281_0: * ... and kicked the ball as hard as she could^1, right into Officer Undyne's car!/
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1282_0: * Then^1, Undyne came out^1, smiling^1, cracked her knuckles^1, and totally wiped us at handball.../
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1287_0: * Yo^1, Kris^1, you look kind of annoyed^1.&* Everything OK?/
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1288_0: * You can calm down now^1, dude^1! Susie's not here^1, haha!/
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1289_0: * ... Huh^1?&* You look even more annoyed.../%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1296_0: * You got to miss class with Alphys^1! It's not fair^1! Ha ha ha^1!/
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1297_0: * If I skipped class^1, my dad'd never let me hear the end of it!!^1! Ha ha ha!!!/
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1298_0: * ... That's actually not even remotely funny./%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1316_0: * Hey neighbor-beighbor^1! When's yah brother Doug gonna come by^1? Huh huh huh!/
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1317_0: * My girls'd love to see him^1! He's a sweet little man!/
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1318_0: * He's just got one problem..^1.&* He doesn't like my wife's cookin'!/
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1319_0: * What's wrong^1, Douglas^1?&* You don't like frozen cat food^1? Huh huh huh!/%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1323_0: * Can't blame yah brother for leavin' town./
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1324_0: * He's out there^1, gettin' a big brain in the big school./
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1325_0: * Hope when he becomes a big shot^1, he remembers us little guys down the street./
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1326_0: * Eatin' oranges and gettin' our stomachs pumped./%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1348_0: * Oh^1, it's you^1.&* Are you here to play the piano again?/
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1349_0: * The patients can't hear it well from here^1, but I personally enjoy it./%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1353_0: * Sometimes the police chief comes in to play the piano./
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1354_0: * Her playing is nice^1, but when she starts singing.../
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1355_0: * We have to ask her to leave./%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1361_0: * Hmmm..^1. you usually play the piano a bit more..^1. beautifully./
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1362_0: * Is everything OK^1?&* You DO seem a little sick.../%
obj_npc_room_slash_Other_10_gml_1371_0: * Nothin' better than hangin' at the lake with my best bro.../
